import React from 'react'; import { useConversations } from '../context/ConversationsProvider'; export default function Conversations() { const { conversations, selectedConversationIdx } = useConversations(); console.log(conversations) return (
{conversations.map((conversation, idx) => {

{conversation.recipients.map(name => name.join())}

Ok, see you at the subway in a bit.

Just now

})}

Angelina Jolie

Ok, see you at the subway in a bit.

Just now

{/*

Tony Stark

Hey, Are you there?

10min

Scarlett Johansson

You sent a photo.

1h

John Snow

You missed a call John.

4h

*/}
) }
